EmailTemplate.description: Boise, Negotiation Skills PD Day "save the date" 10/31/08
EmailTemplate.name: Boise, Negotiation Skills PD Day -2008 (Invitation)
EmailTemplate.subject: American Student Assistance Training Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join ASA this month! We are coming to Idaho with our popular professional development workshop.
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a full-day training event for all financial aid professionals in Idaho. Now is the time to improve your skills at our training event. Join us to enhance core skills and stay ahead of evolving trends.
Training Event: Negotiation Skills
10/31/2008 from 8:30 AM - 4:00PM Boise State University - Boise, Idaho www.boisestate.edu We are offering a full day workshop designed for all college administrators who are looking to improve their performance at work and add skills to their personal “tool box.”
Please join us. 8:30am - 4:00pm Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided
Course Descriptions: Based on the principles developed at the Harvard Negotiation Project and by Roger Fisher, coauthor of the bestseller Getting to Yes, ASA's training programs build each participants capacity to transform adversarial approaches to conflict into problem-solving collaborations, producing better outcomes for all parties while enhancing long-term working relationships.
How You Will Benefit Enhance participants' negotiation skills through hands-on experience and feedback.
How to register or for additional information, including driving directions
· Register Online at http://www.amsa.com/fap/training · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099
All American Student Assistance training events are offered free of charge
